name: Silver Ring
description: A shiny silver ring with a simple design
looks: The silver ring is made of high-quality silver with a polished finish. It has a smooth band with no engravings or embellishments.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of gauntlets made from sturdy steel
looks: The gauntlets are made from polished steel plates, providing excellent hand protection. They have finger loops and adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Amulet of Power
description: A magical amulet that enhances the wearer's physical and magical abilities.
looks: The Amulet of Power is a small pendant made of a glowing crystal, encased in a metal frame. It emits a soft, vibrant light and is attached to a sturdy chain.

special_effects.power_absorption: Absorbs a portion of damage dealt and converts it into bonus MP.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of wrapped leather and has a crossguard for protection.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Dragon Slayer Sword
description: A legendary sword said to have the power to slay dragons.
looks: The Dragon Slayer Sword has a long, curved blade made from gleaming silver steel. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings of dragons and is wrapped in a soft, black leather grip. The pommel has a dragon head design with ruby eyes.

special_weapon_skills.dragon_slaying: Grants a bonus to damage against dragons.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made from steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are plated with steel to provide maximum protection for the hands and wrists. They are intricately designed with ridges and grooves to improve grip and allow for freedom of movement.

name: Shadow Dagger
description: A deadly dagger imbued with shadow magic.
looks: The Shadow Dagger has a curved blade made of obsidian, with a dark, almost black color. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and has a small gemstone embedded in the pommel.

special_weapon_skills.dagger_proficiency: Increases damage and accuracy with daggers.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Chance to deal additional shadow damage on hit.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A wooden staff imbued with fire magic, allowing the wielder to cast powerful fireball spells.
looks: The Fireball Staff is made from polished oak wood, with intricate carvings of flames along the length of the staff. At the top, there is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery red light.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Grants a bonus to Fire Magic skill when wielded.

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautifully crafted bow made by skilled Elven artisans.
looks: The Elven Bow is made from a combination of polished wood and elegant silver accents. It has intricate engravings of Elven symbols along its length, giving it an ethereal and graceful appearance.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Grants a bonus to Archery skill when wielded.

name: Gold Ring
description: A beautiful ring made of solid gold.
looks: The gold ring has a simple and elegant design, with a smooth band and a small gemstone in the center.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.
